Large historical data sets
==========================

Larger historial prices and volume data is provided for three companies:

+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------+ 
| Ticker  | Description                                           | Number of rows | 
+=========+=======================================================+================+ 
| AAPL    | End of day data for Apple Computer from 1986 - 2012   | 8,336          | 
+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------+ 
| BA      | End of day data for Apple Computer from 1962 - 2012   | 13,090         | 
+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------+ 
| CAT     | End of day data for Apple Computer from 1962 - 2012   | 13,090         |
+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------+
